testsuite.system-out:
=== Performance Test Execution Report === Test Environment: perf-test-01 Start Time: 2023-12-01T11:15:00 Duration: 45.234 seconds Total Tests: 100 Passed: 92 Failed: 5 Errors: 1 Skipped: 2
Performance Metrics: - Average Response Time: 1.234 seconds - Peak Memory Usage: 2.5 GB - CPU Utilization: 85% - Network I/O: 125 MB/s - Disk I/O: 45 MB/s
Critical Issues Found: 1. Memory leak in connection handling 2. Performance degradation under high load 3. Connection pool exhaustion at 1000+ users 4. JVM crash with insufficient heap space 5. Deadlock in concurrent transaction processing
Recommendations: - Increase JVM heap size to 4GB - Optimize database connection pooling - Implement circuit breaker pattern - Add memory monitoring and alerting - Review concurrent access patterns

=== OVERALL TEST EXECUTION SUMMARY === Total Execution Time: 245.678 seconds (4 minutes 5 seconds) Total Test Suites: 4 Total Test Cases: 500
Results Summary: ✓ Passed: 455 (91.0%) ✗ Failed: 25 (5.0%) ⚠ Errors: 5 (1.0%) ↷ Skipped: 15 (3.0%)
Performance Impact: - Peak Memory Usage: 3.2 GB - Average CPU Usage: 78% - Total Network I/O: 1.2 GB - Total Disk I/O: 450 MB
Test Categories: - Performance Tests: 100 (92% pass rate) - Integration Tests: 200 (90% pass rate) - API Tests: 150 (91.3% pass rate) - Security Tests: 50 (92% pass rate)
Critical Findings: 1. System performance degrades at high concurrency 2. Memory management issues under sustained load 3. Database connection pooling needs optimization 4. API rate limiting functioning correctly 5. Security controls passing most validation tests
Next Steps: - Address performance bottlenecks identified - Investigate memory leak patterns - Optimize database connection management - Review error handling in concurrent scenarios - Schedule follow-up performance testing after fixes
